content: or purl-wise follow these four steps until you have one stitch on each needle 5 enter the first stitch on the front needle as if to knit take that stitch off the needle 6 enter the second stitch on the front needle as if to purl leave the stitch on the needle pull yarn through both stitches 7 enter the first stitch on the back needle as if to purl take that stitch off the needle 8 enter the second stitch on the back needle as if to knit leave the stitch on the needle pull yarn through both stitches final two stitches 3 knit on the front needle pull yarn through pull that stitch off the needle 4 purl on the back needle pull yarn through pull that stitch off the needle finishing weave in all lose ends using the tapestry needle looking forward to seeing you wear your hat at a women s march in double_crochet or in your area share photos of your hats on social media using #hatsforharris copyright joy macdonell not for distribution or duplication 8 knitting chart for pattern option 2 copyright joy macdonell not for distribution or duplication 9
